text: Masilo Michael Modubi (born 22 April 1985, in Polokwane) is a South African footballer.They call Modubi the African Pep Guardiola news24.com He currently serves as manager for Belgian club KESK Leopoldsburg. He spent an eight-year spell at Belgian club Westerlo and then three years at Dessel Sport. == Trivia == He began his career 1992 by Real Gunners later in January 1995 moved to Ria Stars, from the Pietersburg based team was 1996 scouted from Transnet Sport School of Excellence in 2003 was sold to Chelsea F.C. in England. The London- based club sold him in July 2003 to K.V.C.
